text:
Monterosa | Senior Javascript Engineer, Tech Lead, Solutions Architect | Liverpool and London (Farringdon) | Full-Time | ONSITE

Monterosa creates game-changing fan engagement products that help our clients grow and monetize direct audience relationships. Our products are scalable and highly available, support 500k+ concurrent websocket connections and 50k+ RESTful requests per second. Check our job openings here: https://monterosa.homerun.co/ Email: andrey@monterosa.co.uk
